trans-unit.source: Provides data for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] events that are passed to an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventHandler"></xref> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] eventos que são transferidos para um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventHandler"> </xref> delegar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If a client has added event handlers for more than one event using the same <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventHandler> instance, EventId can be used to identify the event that the delegate should process.
trans-unit.target: Se um cliente tem de adicionar processadores de eventos para mais do que um evento com o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventHandler>instância, EventId pode ser utilizada para identificar o evento que deve processar o delegado.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventHandler>
